content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord, Peter Schmidt: As a highly sought-after apartment in such a prime location, I must emphasize its exceptional value. However, I'm willing to listen to your proposal regarding the rental price. Go ahead and name a figure that you feel comfortable with. If I find it acceptable, I agree to the price of [desired high rental price] Euro! Otherwise, I might have to reconsider your offer's suitability for this exclusive apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Dear Mr. Schmidt, while acknowledging the desirability of the location, as a student with limited means, I must be cautious with my expenses. I have carefully considered my budget and would like to propose a rental price considerably lower than what you mentioned. I hope you'll take my financial situation into account and consider a price more suitable for someone like me. If we can find a middle ground, I agree to the price of [much lower desired rental price] Euro! If not, I understand your position but must continue my search for more affordable options.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As the greedy landlord, Peter Schmidt: While I sympathize with your financial situation as a student, this apartment is in high demand due to its unbeatable location and modern features. The rental price I had proposed reflects the premium nature of this property. However, if you insist on a significantly lower offer, I'm afraid it might not be feasible for me to accommodate such a substantial discount, given the investment I've made in this apartment. TERMINATE (As the negotiation didn't result in an agreed price.)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
